code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var musicSlice=createSlice({name:"music",initialState:{music:[]},reducers:{getMusicFetch:function getMusicFetch(state,action){},getMusicSuccess:function getMusicSuccess(state,action){state.music=action.payload;},deleteMusicSlice:function deleteMusicSlice(state,action){console.log(action.payload,"id for deleting");var f=state.music.splice(action.payload,1);console.log(f);return state;},editMusicSlice:function editMusicSlice(state,action){state=state.music.map(function(i){return i.id===action.payload.id?action.payload:i;});return state;}}});var _musicSlice$actions=musicSlice.actions,getMusicFetch=_musicSlice$actions.getMusicFetch,deleteMusicSlice=_musicSlice$actions.deleteMusicSlice,editMusicSlice=_musicSlice$actions.editMusicSlice,getMusicSuccess=_musicSlice$actions.getMusicSuccess;export{getMusicFetch,deleteMusicSlice,editMusicSlice,getMusicSuccess};export default musicSlice.reducer;
